item.title: Video Editor to create engaging trailers and promotional videos - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a fast and efficient video editor to create engaging trailers and promotional videos!

• Edit quickly, prioritize watchability over perfection
• Add music, text overlays, basic motion graphics
• Strong CTAs for ticket sales
• Experience with event trailers a plus
• Proficient in video editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
• Excellent communication & ability to handle revisions
• Bonus: Familiarity with the Masterclass video style

Please include the following in your proposal:
• Your hourly or per-video editing rates.
• Estimated turnaround time per video.
• A link to your portfolio showcasing similar work.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 01:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Trailer, Adobe Premiere Pro, Testimonial Video
Skills: Video Editing, Trailer, Adobe Premiere Pro, Testimonial Video
Country: Singapore

item.title: Adobe Premiere Pro YouTube Video Editor/Motion Graphics Project - Upwork
item.description:
The price indicated is per video. I need a total of exceeding/over 1000 videos. We will not talk about the budget, What I have indicated is final. The payments are made when the video is done, and am satisfied with the output.

**Bid only if you can provide a sample video with a given short audio. Approximately 2 minutes.**

I'm looking for a professional Premiere Pro video editor to work on my YouTube channel. The videos are typically short, 4K resolution, and last between 5-10 minutes.

This project needs a fast laptop or desktop for video editing using Adobe Premiere Pro.
I will provide a voice over for each video (Duration atmost 10 minutes), Then you will cut portions of stock videos to match the audio. You will also add images between the video portions when making the videos.
You'll need to add lower thirds to match the provided audio/voiceover.
You need to have 4K elements(Like transitions, Etc.) to create 4K Stunning videos.
Envato Elements access is an added advantage.

So basically this task is about creating short and unique video using provided audio, Creativity is highly encouraged. And it's a long term project which can last for two(2) years.

When bidding on this project you can attach some of the videos you have edited that uses the requirements above.

Key Requirements:
- Expertise in Adobe Premiere Pro: You should have extensive experience with the software to seamlessly edit and produce high-quality videos.
- Graphics and Animations: The videos require full graphics and animations. You should have a keen eye for design and be able to create visually appealing elements.

Ideal Skills:
- Video Editing: An in-depth understanding of video editing techniques and the ability to produce engaging content.
- Animation and Graphics: Experience in adding animations and graphics to videos, enhancing their visual appeal.
- YouTube Video Editing: Understanding of YouTube video standards and best practices is a plus.

Professionalism and reliability are essential. Please share any relevant portfolio or examples of your work in your proposal. Thank you!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 24, 2024 01:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Kenya
click to apply

item.title: VA Position - Social Media Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Virtual Assistant for Fashion Brand

Are you a creative powerhouse with a passion for fashion? We are seeking a dynamic and talented Virtual Assistant to join our fashion brand's team. The ideal candidate will have a flair for beautiful imagery and storytelling, with the ability to create engaging content from our FB lives, photoshoots, and behind-the-scenes footage.

Responsibilities:

Content Creation: Edit and assemble footage from Facebook Live sessions, photoshoots, and behind-the-scenes clips into compelling stories, reels, and social media posts.
Graphic Design: Create visually stunning graphics that align with our brand’s aesthetic for social media, email campaigns, and website.
Social Media Management: Plan, schedule, and post engaging content on our social media platforms.
E-commerce Management: Maintain and update our Shopify store, ensuring all product listings are current and visually appealing.
Email Marketing: Design and send email campaigns using Klayvio, crafting compelling messages that drive engagement and sales.
Blog Writing: Write and publish engaging blog posts related to fashion, style tips, behind-the-scenes stories, and other relevant topics to enhance our brand’s online presence.
Requirements:

Creative Skills: Strong ability to create visually appealing content. Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) and graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator).
Social Media Savvy: Experience with creating and managing content for social media platforms, particularly Instagram and Facebook.
Shopify Expertise: Familiarity with Shopify, including product uploads, store management, and basic troubleshooting.
Klayvio Proficiency: Experience with creating email campaigns and managing email lists in Klayvio.
Writing Skills: Excellent writing skills with the ability to create engaging and well-structured blog posts.
Attention to Detail: Strong attention to detail to ensure all content aligns with our brand standards.
Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience in the fashion industry.
A portfolio showcasing your creative work, especially in video, graphic design, and blog writing.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Why Join Us?

Be part of a vibrant and creative team in the fashion industry.
Opportunity to showcase your creativity and contribute to the growth of a unique brand.
Flexible working hours

How to Apply:

If you are a creative individual with a passion for fashion and the skills to match, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, a cover letter detailing your experience, and a portfolio of your work (especially any relevant video, graphic design, and blog writing projects).

Hourly Range: $17.00-$59.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 01:29 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Copy for an instagram reel - simple but very emotional and engaging. - Upwork
item.description:
Important note: this job has opportunity for a lot of future work for someone who is very talented and delivers very well.  

Job scope:
Looking for someone to help me create really engaging, emotional, and heart felt copy for an instagram reel I will be posting soon.

The copy will be very short, probably less than 60 words or so.  

I’ve already created the raw video for reel (I can modify as needed) but I need help with creating the on image text.  

The reel is less than 20 seconds long.

For privacy reasons I’ll share the reel video at the time of hiring.  

But i’ve got an incredible scene of me and my dad watching an amazing sunset together while on the beach in Mexico.    

I have a travel business where I guide people to earn points and miles and redeem them for travel and on my social media I share experiences of my travel and also aim to inspire people to want to travel the world.

So my intent with this reel is to be something very heartfelt about me spending time with my dad.   

The on image text needs to be really effective and engaging.   

You can help give me recommendations of audio to go with the reel as well although I have a good idea in mind that I can also share.

At time of hiring I will share:
- reel raw video
- loom video describing my thoughts.
- my instagram account.  

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 24, 2024 01:23 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Content Writing, Creative Writing, Copywriting, Instagram
Skills: Content Writing, Creative Writing, Copywriting, Instagram
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Need green screen choreographed dance to event's theme song in "Just Dance" game style - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking to create a "Just Dance" style dance along video

We are having a motivational event which will encourage teens from around the world to SHINE Christ's light to others around them. This is a Christian, not for profit mental health awareness, body positivity and inclusivity event.

For this event, we have invited a thousand kids from our church congregations in Africa, Australia, Argentina, USA, Germany and several hundred from our home in Canada.

We have tried to keep our event costs as low budget as possible seeing as its strictly a charitable event.

We are grateful to have some talents, influencers and performers that have volunteered to dedicate some time or talent to help make the event special for the kids. Including our special guest hosting/performing at the event -Brandon Leake who was the only ever Spoken word artist that won the show America's Got Talent.

We are looking to make a "dance along" video like the Just Dance video game that will have choreography to our event's theme song.

This will need to be green screen dancing to our provided song and dancer must wear high contrast clothing to give the right vibe for Just Dance after the effects are added.

Here are some examples of people dancing to the song. We are looking for something like this but hopefully with some improvements to make it meet the Just Dance standard of dancing.

Once we have the green screen dancer footage, we have another freelancer that has offered to take that video and do the editing and effects to turn it into a Just Dance style video that our teens can dance along with, much like the game. See this example: https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=1ca0367b36718a85&sca_upv=1&q=just+dance+2019+ideo&tbm=vid&source=lnms&fbs=AEQNm0DVrIRjdA3gRKfJJ-deMT8ZtYOjoIt1NWOMRkEKym4u5PkAZgxJOmIgPx6WieMhF6q1Hq7W6nME2Vp0eHuijF3ZElaTgD0zbj1gkQrti2r6HpgEQJ__FI2P2zVbzOTQnx-xQGuWfPA7_LjHL8X54xCjPigLtLX638JLYGhCvRlpvvGBo-fNpc7q_rU8dgffCadMYeMgxPqmupqDpgcFpVxKo2EBMA&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiUloTLh_OGAxVjhYkEHeYxCq4Q0pQJegQIDhAB&biw=1297&bih=788&dpr=2#fpstate=ive&vld=cid:e57e7c17,vid:D1sJoUkowUY,st:0

Anyways, please let us know if you'd be interested in this type of job.

AND PLEASE PROVIDE FLAT RATE COST. Looking to get this done ASAP. Thanks



Posted On: June 24, 2024 01:18 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Choreography, Dancing
Skills: Choreography, Dancing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Creative Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Explainer Video Creator Wanted!!!

PORTFOLIO IS A MUST!!!

We're searching for a creative and tech-savvy Explainer Video Creator to join our team. Your role will involve crafting engaging and informative videos that break down complex ideas into simple, easy-to-understand visuals and narratives. Ideal candidates will have a strong background in graphic design, animation, and video editing, with a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail. If you're passionate about turning information into captivating visual stories and have experience with video production tools, we'd love to see your work.

This project requires you to work with zoom screen sharing.  If you are not ok with working with zoom screen sharing, please do not apply.

Work Hours 11:30AM to 6:00PM PST (Los Angeles Time) Monday-Friday (Weekend Optional)

Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 01:11 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Skills: Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Country: United States
